column2: "Aber no mu ara
column3: nyimpadodow mpempem boaboaa ano
column4: ma mpo wotsiatsiaa hɔnho do no
column5: ɔhyɛɛ ase kaa kyerɛɛ n'esuafo no kan dɛ
column6: Hom nhwɛ yie wɔ Farisiifo mbɔrkaw ho: ɔno nye ndabraba."

column2: "Na biribi do nnkatae a worinnyi no edzi
column3: na onnhuntae a worunnhu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi biribi a hom aka wɔ sum mu no
column3: wɔbɛtse no wɔ kan mu; na dza hom aka wɔ asomu wɔ adankyir no
column4: wɔbɛpaa mu aka wɔ adan etsifi."

column2: "Na meka kyerɛ hom
column3: m'anyɛnkofo dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnsuro hɔn a woku honam
column5: na n'ekyir no wonnyi biribi a wobotum ayɛ bio."

column2: "Na mebɛkyerɛ hom nyia hom nsuro no: hom nsuro nyia oeku ewie no
column3: ɔwɔ tum dɛ ɔdze kɔto amandzehu kurow mu: nyew
column4: mese hom dɛ

column2: "Ana nsorɔm enum wɔnntɔn nngye mpɛsewa ebien? Naaso hɔn mu kor ara mpo nnyi hɔ a enyi pa no do wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."
"Na hom tsinhwi mpo wɔakan ne nyina. Mma hom nnsuro: osiandɛ hom som bo kyɛn nsorɔm pii."
"Na mese hom dɛ
column3: Obiara a ɔbɔbɔ me dzin wɔ nyimpa enyim no
column4: ɔno na nyimpa Ba no bɔbɔ ne dzin wɔ Nyankopɔn abɔfoe enyim;"

column2: "na nyia ɔpa me nyimpa enyim no
column3: ɔno na wɔbɛpa no Nyankopɔn abɔfoe enyim."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛka asɛm etsia nyimpa Ba no
column3: wɔdze bɛkyɛ no; na nyia ɔka ebususɛm tsia Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no
column4: wɔnnkɛfa akyɛ no."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔdze hom ba nhyiamudan mu nye mpanyimfo nye etumfo enyim a
column3: mma hom nndwendwen mbrɛ hom bɛyɛ anaa dza hom bɛka eyi homho
column4: anaa dza hom bɛse:"

column2: "osiandɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛkyerɛ hom dɔn no ara mu dza ɔsɛ dɛ hom bɛka."
"Na obi fi nyimpadodow no mu see no dɛ
column3: Kyerɛkyerɛfo
column4: ka kyerɛ mo nua ma ɔnye me nkyɛ ewungyadze no."

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Nyimpa
column4: woana yɛɛ me ɔsɛndzifo nye adzekyɛfo wɔ hom do?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ yie na hom nsie homho wɔ enyikaber nyina ho: na nyimpa no nkwa nnyi ndzɛmba a oenya abor do mu."

column2: "Na obuu hɔn bɛ bi dɛ
column3: Nyimpa bi a ɔyɛ ɔdzefo n'asaase soow pii;"

column2: "na osusuu ne tsir mu dɛ
column3: Mebɛyɛ dɛn? Osiandɛ minnyi beebi mbrɛ medze mo nduadzewa besie."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Iyi na mebɛyɛ: mubodwuruw m'asan egu famu
column4: na mesi akɛse; na hɔ na medze m'ekuadze nye me ndzɛmba nkaa no nyina besie."

column2: "Na mase me kra dɛ
column3: Ɔkra
column4: ewɔ ndzɛmba pii a wɔdze egu hɔ ama mfe pii: gye w'ahom

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn see no dɛ
column3: Ɔkwasea
column4: anafua yi wɔbɛgye wo kra wɔ wo nsamu; na dza esiesie no bɛyɛ woana dze?"

column2: "Mbrɛ nyia ɔboaboa akoradze ano ma noho
column3: na ɔnnyɛ ɔdzefo wɔ Nyankopɔn afamu tse nye no."

column2: "Na ɔsee n'esuafo no dɛ
column3: Dɛm ntsi mese hom dɛ
column4: Mma hom nndwendwen wɔ hom nkwa ho

column2: "Nkwa kyɛn edziban
column3: na nyimpadua kyɛn efuradze."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ nkonkoran dɛ wonndua na wommbu
column3: wonnyi efiadze anaa ɔsan
column4: naaso Nyankopɔn nyɛn hɔn: ɔkyɛn bɛn na hom nsom bo nkyɛn nnoma no."

column2: "Na hom mu woana na ɔdwendwen a
column3: obotum dze basafa kor ato ne tsentsen do?"

column2: "Na sɛ hom nntum adze ketseaba dɛm mpo yɛ a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom dwendwen nkaa no ho?"

column2: "Hom nhwɛ haban mu nsukookoo
column3: mbrɛ wonyin: wɔnnyɛ edwuma
column4: eso wɔnntow asaaba; naaso mese hom dɛ Solomon n'enyimnyam nyina mu no mpo

column2: "Na sɛ Nyankopɔn ma haban mu efuw a ɔwɔ hɔ ndɛ na ɔkyena wɔdze gu fononoo mu efuradze dɛm a
column3: mpɛn ahen na ɔnnkɛma hom ma akyɛn dɛm
column4: hom a hom gyedzi suar?"

column2: "Na mma hom nnhwehwɛ dza hom bedzi anaa dza hom bɔnom
column3: eso mma hom adwen nnyɛ hom konsee."

column2: "Na dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina na wiadze amanaman hwehwɛ: na hom Egya nyim dɛ yinom hia hom."
"Na mbom hom nhwehwɛ n'ahenman no
column3: na wɔdze yinom bɛka hom ho."

column2: "Mma hom nnsuro
column3: oguankuw ketseaba: na ɔyɛ hom Egya fɛw dɛ ɔdze ahenman no bɛma hom."

column2: "Hom ntɔn dza hom wɔ mfa nyɛ ayɛ; hom nyɛ nkotoku a ɔrennyɛ dadaw mma homho
column3: akoradze wɔ sor a ɔnnsa
column4: mbrɛ owifo mmbɛn ho

column2: "Na mbrɛ hom akoradze wɔ no
column3: hɔ na hom akoma so wɔ."

column2: "Hom mbɔ hom asen do
column3: na hom nkandzea ndzɛw;"

column2: "na hom nyɛ dɛ nyimpa a wɔrotweɔn hɔn wura
column3: aber kor a obefi ayefor ase aba
column4: ma sɛ ɔba na ɔbɔbɔ mu a

column2: "Nhyira aka nkowaa no a
column3: sɛ owura no ba a
column4: ɔbɔto hɔn dɛ wɔroweɔn: nokwar mese hom dɛ ɔbɔbɔ noho do

column2: "Na sɛ ɔba dasu ebien anaa ebiasa mu
column3: na ɔbɔto hɔn dɛm a
column4: nhyira aka nkowaa no."

column2: "Na hom nhu yi
column3: dɛ sɛ ofiwura no nyim dɔn kor a owifo no bɛba a
column4: nkyɛ ɔbɔweɔn amma woeemmbobubu ne dan mu enndua mu."

column2: "Na hom so hom nyɛ krado
column3: osiandɛ dɔn a hom nnsusu mu na nyimpa Ba no reba."

column2: "Na Peter see dɛ
column3: Ewuradze
column4: hɛn nko na ibu hɛn bɛ yi

column2: "Na Ewuradze see dɛ
column3: Woana koraa nye ofihwɛfo nokwafo nye nyansafo a no wura dze no besi ne fifo do
column4: dɛ ɔmma hɔn edziban a ɔyɛ hɔn kyɛpɛn wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu?"

column2: "Nhyira aka akowaa no a
column3: sɛ no wura ba a
column4: obohu no dɛ ɔreyɛ dɛm."

column2: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ ɔdze no besi n'adze a ɔwɔ nyina do."
"Na sɛ akowaa no se n'akoma mu dɛ
column3: Mo wura rikyim ne ba; na ɔhyɛ ase bobɔ nkowaa nye mfonabaa no
column4: na odzidzi na ɔnom bow a;"

column2: "akowaa no wura bɛba da a ɔronnhwɛ no kwan
column3: ɔnye dɔn a onnyim mu
column4: na oetwa no mu ebien
column5: na ɔama ɔnye ndabrabafo no edzi afora."

column2: "Na akowaa no a onyim no wura ne pɛ
column3: na oennsiesie noho
column4: na eso ɔannyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ no

column2: "Na nyia onnyim
column3: na ɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba a ɔsɛ ɔhwe no
column4: wɔbɔhwe no kakrabaa. Na obiara a wɔama no dodow na wɔbɛgye dodow wɔ no hɔ; na nyia wɔdze pii ahyɛ ne nsa no
column5: nna wobebisa no dza ɔbor do."

column2: "Mebae dɛ morobɔsɔ gya wɔ asaase do
column3: na sɛ asɔ dada a
column4: ebɛnadze bio na mepɛ sen dɛm?"

column2: "Na mowɔ enuma bi a wɔdze bonuma me
column3: na mbrɛ mo ho dua kyer me gyedɛ ayɛ hɔ ana!"

column2: "Hom susu dɛ mebae dɛ merebɛma asomdwee wɔ asaase do anaa? Mese hom dɛ
column3: Dabida
column4: na mbom mpaapaamu a:"

column2: "na ofitsi ndɛ beenum wɔ ofi kor mu bedzi mpaapaamu
column3: baasa nye beenu benya
column4: na beenu nye baasa so enya."

column2: "Wobedzi mpaapaamu
column3: ma egya nye ba enya
column4: na ɔba nye n'egya enya; na na nye babaa enya
column5: na babaa nye ne na enya; asewbasia nye n'asew enya

column2: "Na ɔsee nyimpadodow no so dɛ
column3: Sɛ hom hu nsuwusiw fir anee rosoɛr a
column4: ntsɛmara hom se dɛ

column2: "Na sɛ hom hu dɛ pomu mframa robɔ a
column3: hom se dɛ
column4: Ɔhyew reba

column2: "Ndabrabafo
column3: hom nyim asaase nye ɔsor enyim ndzɛmba ho ase kyerɛ; na ɔyɛ dɛn na hom nnhu aber yi ne nkyerɛasee yi?"

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn na homankasa so hom mmbu dza ɔtsen ho atsɛn?"
"Na enye wo tamfo rokɔ otumfo enyim a
column3: enye no wɔ kwan mu no
column4: bɔ mbɔdzen yi woho wɔ ne nsamu; amma ɔaammfa wo annhyɛ ɔsɛndzifo nsa
column5: na ɔsɛndzifo no aammfa wo annhyɛ ɔsomfo no nsa
column6: na ɔsomfo no aammfa wo annkɔto efiadze."

column2: "Nokwar mese wo dɛ
column3: Innkefi hɔ ara da
column4: gyedɛ etua kapɛrba a aka ekyir no mpo ana."
